ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team3.WeatherApp

Class MarsForecast

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team3.WeatherApp.MarsForecast

  • public class MarsForecast
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is made to hold and give the information for mars forecast. It uses the inherited methods from WeatherJSON as those are the same. The only difference in the Mars information is that it comes from a different parser.
